summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4677 for the improvement of Portland Street from Beacon Avenue to 28th Avenue South, by constructing wooden curbs and gutters and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54231, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
